setEnabled(boolean).Description: Sets whether the route is enabled. Disabled routes represent routes that a route provider knows about, such as paired Wifi Display receivers, but that are not currently available for use.

setVolumeMax(int).Description: Sets the route's maximum volume, or 0 if unknown.

setDescription(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the user-visible description of the route. The route description describes the kind of destination represented by the route. It may be a user-supplied string, a model number or brand of device.

setId(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the unique id of the route. The route id associated with a route descriptor functions as a stable identifier for the route and must be unique among all routes offered by the provider.

setCanDisconnect(boolean).Description: Sets whether the route can be disconnected without stopping playback.

setIconUri(android.net.Uri).Description: Sets the URI of the icon representing this route. This icon will be used in picker UIs if available. The URI must be one of the following formats: content (@B_android#content#ContentResolver#SCHEME_CONTENT_E@) android.resource (@B_android#content#ContentResolver#SCHEME_ANDROID_RESOURCE_E@) file (@B_android#content#ContentResolver#SCHEME_FILE_E@)

Parameters: int: how volume is handled on the route: @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouter#RouteInfo#PLAYBACK_VOLUME_FIXED_E@ or @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouter#RouteInfo#PLAYBACK_VOLUME_VARIABLE_E@.

setPresentationDisplayId(int).Description: Sets the route's presentation display id, or -1 if none.

setConnecting(boolean).Description: Use @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouteDescriptor#Builder#setConnectionState_E@ instead. Sets whether the route is in the process of connecting and is not yet ready for use.

setVolume(int).Description: Sets the route's current volume, or 0 if unknown.

Parameters: int: The receive device type of the route: @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouter#RouteInfo#DEVICE_TYPE_TV_E@ or @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouter#RouteInfo#DEVICE_TYPE_SPEAKER_E@.
setDeviceType(int).Description: Sets the route's receiver device type.

setName(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the user-visible name of the route. The route name identifies the destination represented by the route. It may be a user-supplied name, an alias, or device serial number.

setExtras(android.os.Bundle).Description: Sets a bundle of extras for this route descriptor. The extras will be ignored by the media router but they may be used by applications.

addControlFilter(android.content.IntentF.Description: Adds a @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaControlIntent_E@ filter for the route.

Parameters: int: The playback type of the route: @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouter#RouteInfo#PLAYBACK_TYPE_LOCAL_E@ or @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouter#RouteInfo#PLAYBACK_TYPE_REMOTE_E@.

setSettingsActivity(android.content.Inte.Description: Sets an intent sender for launching the settings activity for this route.

Parameters: int: The connection state of the route: @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouter#RouteInfo#CONNECTION_STATE_DISCONNECTED_E@, @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouter#RouteInfo#CONNECTION_STATE_CONNECTING_E@, or @B_android#support#v7#media#MediaRouter#RouteInfo#CONNECTION_STATE_CONNECTED_E@.
